item.title: By: Saylah
item.dc:creator: Saylah
item.description: Pre-ordered and almost guaranteed for the 17th. Either way, I wont be around. Luck of the evil work gods that I'm leaving town for business for

item.title: By: Dreaming

item.description: I'll be there at midnight and at the release party on the 16th. We be skipping work for this.

item.title: By: steven v
item.dc:creator: steven v
item.description: I jsut contact the place where I pre-ordered my TBC copy. I will definately be getting my copy on 1.17.07. =) I am happy.
item.content:encoded:
I jsut contact the place where I pre-ordered my TBC copy. I will definately be getting my copy on 1.17.07. =)
I am happy.

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Can always call the "My whole family have died. I'm going to need a week to myself."...but then if they actually do...yeah... :/
item.content:encoded: Can always call the “My whole family have died. I’m going to need a week to myself.”…but then if they actually do…yeah… :/

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
I ordered mine from Amazon, and according to them, it will show up on the 17th. Now, in the event that it doesn't, I won't be particularly upset. In all honesty, I really don't expect the game to be playable on the 16th, I just don't see how they could have a trouble free launch. I mean, even with patch 2.0 things were pretty screwed up, how could TBC be any better? I'm still leveling my priest alt and having a blast with that so worse case scenario I can still play with that character.
If anything it gives my relationship another couple of days before it completely implodes under the weight of MMO goodness.
item.content:encoded:
I ordered mine from Amazon, and according to them, it will show up on the 17th. Now, in the event that it doesn’t, I won’t be particularly upset. In all honesty, I really don’t expect the game to be playable on the 16th, I just don’t see how they could have a trouble free launch. I mean, even with patch 2.0 things were pretty screwed up, how could TBC be any better? I’m still leveling my priest alt and having a blast with that so worse case scenario I can still play with that character.

If anything it gives my relationship another couple of days before it completely implodes under the weight of MMO goodness.

item.title: By: chicogrande
item.dc:creator: chicogrande
item.description:
You just described what I'll likely be doing Tuesday morning, sans suit. I'm banking that large outlets like Fry's/Best Buy will simply have them sitting on the shelves...
I better make some phone calls...
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Can pay ~Â£10 more to pre-order it with a chance someone'll mess up the delivery and I'll get it on the 17th or I can risk it and make the pilgrimmage to my local game shop (which is quite a way away) after work. Hrmz. Decisions.
